mapper.select: select rest_no, rest_name from restaurant where rest_name like #{searchWord}

select distinct(r.review_no) review_no, r.review_content review_content, r.review_post_date review_post_date, rp.review_pic_src review_pic_src, rest.rest_no rest_no, rest.rest_name rest_name from (select * from review where rest_no in (select rest_no from restaurant where code_no in ((select code_no from category where sub_cate like #{keyword}) union (select code_no from category where main_cate like #{keyword})))) r, review_pic rp, restaurant rest where r.review_no = rp.review_no and r.rest_no = rest.rest_no
select rest.rest_no rest_no, rest.rest_name rest_name, rest.rest_profile rest_profile from restaurant rest where rest.rest_name like #{keyword}
select id, nick, profile from member where nick like #{keyword}
